original_text: Each person has only one body, but that body has many parts. All those different parts make only one body. It is like that with Christ too.
korean_text: 몸은 하나인데 많은 지체가 있고 몸의 지체가 많으나 한 몸임과 같이 그리스도도 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: Each person has only one body
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 오직 하나의 몸을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: but that body has many parts
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 몸에는 여러 부분이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: It is like that with Christ too
